description: Brief description of what we're building

stories.story: As a user, I can sign up with my email and password
acceptance_criteria: Signup form with email and password fields
Password must be at least 8 characters
Email validation shows error for invalid format

stories.story: As a user, I can log in to my account
acceptance_criteria: Login form with email and password

stories.story: As a user, I can reset my password
acceptance_criteria: Forgot password link on login page
Enter email to receive reset link
Can set new password via reset link
